evaluation_metadata.description: Comprehensive evaluation of RAG system focusing on precision with small details in large dataset

test_categories.description: Finding specific details in large dataset

tests.query: What is the exact phone number of TechCorp?
What is the exact address of TechCorp office?
What was the exact amount paid for the transaction with invoice number INV-2024-10007?
What is the SKU number for DataVault Pro 5000?
How many employees received salaries in November 2024 according to the financial report?
What is the exact monthly rent for TechCorp's Paris office?
What client ID placed an order for Norwegian research institute?
What is TekCorp's refund polisy?
What services does the companie offer?
tests.expected_answer: AI Consulting, Machine Learning Development, Data Analytics

tests.query: What is the price of AI Assistent Pro?
Tell me about mashine learning services
tests.expected_answer: Machine Learning Development - Custom ML models

test_categories.description: Testing variations in grammar and phrasing

tests.query: What language is supported by TechCorp?
tests.expected_answer: English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese

tests.query: When was TechCorp founded?
How much does DataVision Analytics cost?
tests.note: Different phrasing than 'what is the price'

tests.query: What are the operating hours on Saturday?

test_categories.description: Testing accuracy with numbers, dates, and quantities

tests.query: What is the exact storage capacity included with CloudSync Enterprise?
What discount percentage is offered for annual subscriptions?
How many days is the free trial period?
What was the payroll amount in December 2024?
How many hours of consulting were provided on October 7th, 2024?
What was the hourly rate for the consulting service on December 10, 2024?

test_categories.description: Testing complex queries with multiple criteria

tests.query: What transactions in November 2024 were related to Hardware category and had amounts over 20000 EUR?
tests.expected_answer: Multiple transactions including Neural Processors (CLI-IT-00445, 21499.95 EUR) and Storage Systems (CLI-FR-00789, 25500.00 EUR)

tests.query: Which products cost more than $1000 per month and include API features?
tests.expected_answer: DataVision Analytics ($1,499/month) and SmartPredict ML ($2,499/month) both mention API

tests.query: What AI-related services does TechCorp offer and what is their contact email?
tests.expected_answer: AI Consulting, Machine Learning Development, and contact@techcorp.com

tests.query: Combien d'employés travaillent chez TechCorp?
Quelles sont les valeurs de TechCorp?
What languages are supported by the AI Assistant Pro product?

test_categories.description: Testing handling of abbreviations and technical terms

tests.query: What ML products does TechCorp offer?
tests.expected_answer: SmartPredict ML - Machine learning platform for predictive modeling
tests.note: ML should expand to Machine Learning

tests.query: Does TechCorp provide AI solutions?
tests.expected_answer: Yes, AI Consulting and AI Assistant Pro

scoring_criteria.semantic_match: Answer is semantically correct but phrased differently
scoring_criteria.partial_match: Answer contains some correct information but incomplete
scoring_criteria.spelling_correction_detected: System detected and corrected spelling mistake
